translated: “Kauśika, if some son of a good family or some daughter of a good family, in order to make offerings after the parinirvāṇa of the Tathāgata, were to fill with precious substances from the seven precious materials a world system of a billion worlds, and were to make stūpas the size of a league in height,

translated: one will serve, venerate, honor, and worship the tathāgatas, arhats, genuinely perfect buddhas of the past, present, and future.

original: shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed na sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa @388a *//
analyzed: shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed na sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa @388a *//
translated: If all the sentient beings in the eastern direction, in world systems as numerous as the sands of the River Ganges, were to establish each and every one of them in the fruit of being tied to one more rebirth and in the fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth, and if they were to serve, venerate, honor, and worship them all,

original: yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i slad du rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la /
analyzed: yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i slad du rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la /
translated: After his parinirvāṇa, I will make a stūpa of the seven precious substances, one yojana high, in order to make offerings to him.🔽

original: rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis te /🔽de dag la bskal pa'am /
analyzed: rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis te / de dag la bskal pa'am /
translated: After his parinirvāṇa, we will make stūpas out of the seven precious substances, each one yojanas high and half a yojana wide, in order to make offerings to him.

original: bskal pa'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang /

translated: We will make offerings to them for an eon or the remainder of an eon with divine flowers, divine garlands, divine incense, divine perfume, divine powder, divine clothing, divine parasols,🔽divine banners, divine flags, and various divine musical sounds.🔽We will respect them,

original: lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis /🔽bkur stir bgyis /

original: phu dud du bgyis /
analyzed: phu dud du bgyis /

original: mchod par bgyis pa dang / lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed na sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i slad du rin po che sna bdun las bgyis
analyzed: mchod par bgyis pa dang / lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed na sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i slad du rin po che sna bdun las bgyis

analyzed: dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa sdug bsngal ba dang /
translated: the faculties, the powers, the branches of awakening, the noble eightfold path, the emptiness gate of liberation, the signlessness gate of liberation, the wishlessness gate of liberation, the four noble truths of suffering,

original: kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /
analyzed: kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /
translated: its origin, its cessation, and the path, the six higher knowledges, the eight liberations, the nine serial absorptions, all the meditative stabilizations, all the dhāraṇī gateways,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / thams cad shes pa nyid dang /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / thams cad shes pa nyid dang /
translated: the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, great love, great compassion, the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, the knowledge of all aspects,

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus so //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus so //
translated: the knowledge of path aspects, and the knowledge of all things as they are and as many as there are are included.

original: de ni / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bstan pa ste /
analyzed: de ni / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bstan pa ste /
translated: This is the teaching of the lord buddhas.

original: de la bslab cing 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin par gyur to //
analyzed: de la bslab cing 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin par gyur to //
translated: Having trained in it, all śrāvakas, pratyekabuddhas, and lord buddhas of the past, future, and present have reached the perfection of all dharmas.

original: phyin to // phyin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyin to // phyin par 'gyur ro //
translated: They have reached it, they will reach it, and they are reaching it.

analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening has come forth from the perfection of wisdom.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na /
translated: therefore,

original: rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: any son of a good family or

original: rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris te glegs bam du byas shing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing me tog dang /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris te glegs bam du byas shing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing me tog dang /
translated: daughter of a good family who has written out this perfection of wisdom, made it into a book, and who holds it, keeps it, reads it, masters it, properly pays attention to it, and honors it with flowers,

original: phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas /
analyzed: phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas /
translated: garlands, perfume, ointments, aromatic powders, clothing, parasols, victory banners, and flags, and with various musical sounds,

original: bkur ster byas /
analyzed: bkur ster byas /
translated: and honors it,

original: phu dud du byas /
analyzed: phu dud du byas /
translated: He was treated with respect.🔽

original: mchod par byas na /
analyzed: mchod par byas na /
translated: and make offerings to it,🔽then the merit from that would be much greater than the merit from the previous accumulation of merit.

original: bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba 'di la bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba snga mas brgya'i char yang nye bar mi @394b 'gro'o //🔽stong gi cha dang / brgya phrag stong gi cha dang / bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba brgya'i cha dang / bye ba stong gi cha dang / bye ba brgya phrag stong gi cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang /🔽dper yang nye bar mi 'gro /
analyzed: bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba 'di la bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba snga mas brgya'i char yang nye bar mi @394b 'gro'o // stong gi cha dang / brgya phrag stong gi cha dang / bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba brgya'i cha dang / bye ba stong gi cha dang / bye ba brgya phrag stong gi cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dper yang nye bar mi 'gro /
translated: It would not be a hundredth of it,

original: rgyur yang nye bar mi bzod do //
analyzed: rgyur yang nye bar mi bzod do //
translated: not a thousandth, not a hundred thousandth of it, not a one hundred billionth of it, not a one hundred trillionth of it, not a one hundred quintillionth of it, not a count, not a fraction, not an approximation, not a comparison, not a simile, and not an example.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ji srid du dzambu'i gling na gnas pa de srid du sangs rgyas dkon mchog nub par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ji srid du dzambu'i gling na gnas pa de srid du sangs rgyas dkon mchog nub par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: as long as this perfection of wisdom remains in Jambudvīpa, the precious Buddha will not disappear,

original: chos dkon mchog nub par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chos dkon mchog nub par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the precious Dharma will not disappear,

original: dge 'dun dkon mchog nub par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dge 'dun dkon mchog nub par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: and the precious Saṅgha will not disappear.

original: de srid du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de srid du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: As long as there are Buddhas in the world, the ten wholesome paths of action will appear in the world.

original: bsam gtan bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //🔽tshad med pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro // tshad med pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The four meditations will appear in the world.🔽The four immeasurables will appear in the world.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'gyur bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'gyur bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The four formless concentrations will appear in the world.

original: mngon par shes pa lnga 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa lnga 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The five superknowledges will appear in the world.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The perfection of generosity will appear in the world.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The perfection of morality will appear in the world.🔽The perfection of patience will appear in the world.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The perfection of effort will appear in the world.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The perfection of concentration will appear in the world.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //🔽nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro // nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the perfection of wisdom will appear in the world;🔽the emptiness of internal phenomena will appear in the world;

original: @395a *// phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //🔽phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: @395a *// phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro // phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of external phenomena will appear in the world;🔽the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena will appear in the world;

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of emptiness will appear in the world;

original: chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of great extent will appear in the world;

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro // 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of ultimate reality will appear in the world;🔽the emptiness of conditioned phenomena will appear in the world;

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena will appear in the world;🔽the emptiness of the unlimited will appear in the world;

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end will appear in the world;

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of nonrejection will appear in the world;

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of inherent existence will appear in the world;

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of all phenomena will appear in the world;

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of defining characteristics will appear in the world;🔽the emptiness of nonobservation will appear in the world;

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of nonthings will appear in the world;

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of essential nature will appear in the world;

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro; ;dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro; ;dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of the essential nature of nonthings will appear in the world; the applications of mindfulness will appear in the world;

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the right efforts will appear in the world;

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'jig rten du @395b 'byung bar 'gyur ro //🔽dbang po rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'jig rten du @395b 'byung bar 'gyur ro // dbang po rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the bases of supernatural powers appear in the world,

original: stobs rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: stobs rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the powers appear in the world,🔽the forces of enlightenment appear in the world,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the limbs of enlightenment appear in the world,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the noble eightfold path appears in the world,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the noble truths appear in the world,

original: bsam gtan rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the meditative stabilizations appear in the world,

original: tshad med pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the immeasurables appear in the world,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the formless absorptions appear in the world,

original: rnam par thar pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the liberations appear in the world,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: and the nine serial absorptions appear in the world.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: and the wishless gate of liberation will appear in the world.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The superknowledges will appear in the world.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The meditative stabilizations will appear in the world.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The dhāraṇī gateways will appear in the world.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The powers of the tathāgatas will appear in the world.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The fearlessnesses will appear in the world.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //🔽byams pa chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro // byams pa chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The detailed and thorough knowledges will appear in the world.🔽Great love will appear in the world.

original: snying rje chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar @396a *//
analyzed: snying rje chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar @396a *//
translated: Great compassion will appear in the world.

original: 'gyur ro // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'gyur ro // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha will appear in the world.

original: thams cad shes pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the knowledge of all modes will appear in the world;

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the knowledge of paths will appear in the world;

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the knowledge of all modes will appear in the world.

original: de srid du rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de srid du rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: To that extent the great and high families of Khattiyas will appear in the world;

original: bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the great and high families of Brahmins will appear in the world;

original: khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the great and high families of householders will appear in the world.

original: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The gods of the realm of the Four Great Kings will appear in the world;

original: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //🔽mtshe ma'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro // mtshe ma'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the gods of the Thirty-three will appear in the world;🔽the Yāma gods will appear in the world;

original: dga' ldan gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dga' ldan gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the Tusita gods will appear in the world;

original: 'phrul dga'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'phrul dga'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the Nirmāṇarati gods appear in the world;

original: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //🔽tshangs ris kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //🔽tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro // tshangs ris kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro // tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the Paranirmitavaśavartin gods appear in the world;🔽the Brahmakāyika gods appear in the world;🔽the Brahmapurohita gods appear in the world;

original: tshangs ba kun 'khor gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshangs ba kun 'khor gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the Brahmapārṣadya gods appear in the world;

original: tshangs chen gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //🔽snang ba'i lha rnams @396b 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro /
analyzed: tshangs chen gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro // snang ba'i lha rnams @396b 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro /
translated: the Mahābrahmā gods appear in the world;🔽the Ābhāsvara gods appear in the world;

original: chung snang gi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chung snang gi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the Parīttābha gods appear in the world;

original: tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //🔽kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro // kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the Apramāṇābha gods appear in the world;🔽the Ābhāsvara gods appear in the world;

original: dge ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dge ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the Śubhakṛtsna gods appear in the world;

original: chung dge'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //🔽tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chung dge'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro // tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the gods of Lesser Virtue will appear in the world;🔽the gods of Immeasurable Virtue will appear in the world;

original: dge rgyas kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dge rgyas kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the gods of Vast Virtue will appear in the world;

original: che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //🔽chung che'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro // chung che'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the gods of Greatness will appear in the world;🔽the gods of Lesser Greatness will appear in the world;

original: tshad med che ba'i lta rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshad med che ba'i lta rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the gods of Immeasurable Greatness will appear in the world;

original: 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //🔽mi che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro // mi che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the gods of Great Fruit will appear in the world;🔽the gods of No Hardship will appear in the world;

original: mi gdung ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //🔽shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi gdung ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro // shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the gods of No Heat will appear in the world;🔽the gods of Excellent Vision will appear in the world;

original: gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the gods of Manifold Pleasures will appear in the world;

original: 'og min gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'og min gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the gods of the Akaniṣṭha realm appear in the world.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Those who are stream-enterers appear in the world.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //

original: byang @397a *// chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba yod do //

original: chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba yod do //

translated: the perfection of moral discipline will appear in the world;🔽the perfection of patience will appear in the world;

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the perfection of perseverance will appear in the world;

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the perfection of concentration will appear in the world;

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //🔽nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro // nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the perfection of wisdom will appear in the world;🔽inner emptiness will appear in the world;

original: phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: outer emptiness will appear in the world;

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar @398a *//
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar @398a *//
translated: inner and outer emptiness will appear in the world;

original: 'gyur ro // stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'gyur ro // stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of emptiness will appear in the world;

original: chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro /
translated: the emptiness of the great will appear in the world,

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro // 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of the ultimate will appear in the world,🔽the emptiness of the conditioned will appear in the world,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of the unconditioned will appear in the world,🔽the emptiness of what is beyond extremes will appear in the world,

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless will appear in the world,

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of what is not to be discarded will appear in the world,

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of inherent existence will appear in the world,

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of all things will appear in the world,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics will appear in the world,

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: and the emptiness of non-apprehension will appear in the world.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of non-apprehension,🔽the emptiness of essential nature,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness of the essential nature of non-existence,

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the four applications of mindfulness,

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the four right efforts,

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //🔽dbang po rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro // dbang po rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the four bases of magical power,🔽the five faculties,

original: stobs rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar @398b 'gyur ro //
analyzed: stobs rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar @398b 'gyur ro //
translated: the five powers,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the seven factors of awakening,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: and the eightfold noble path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The four noble truths appear in the world.

original: bsam gtan rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //🔽tshad med pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro // tshad med pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the meditative stabilities will appear in the world;🔽the immeasurable aspirations will appear in the world;

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the formless absorptions will appear in the world;

original: rnam par thar pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the deliverances will appear in the world;

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the serial absorptions will appear in the world;

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are doors to deliverance will appear in the world;

original: mngon par shes pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the clairvoyances will appear in the world;

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the meditative stabilities will appear in the world;

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the dhāraṇī gateways will appear in the world;

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the ten powers of the tathāgatas will appear in the world;

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the fearlessnesses will appear in the world;

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //🔽byams pa chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro // byams pa chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the detailed and thorough knowledges will appear in the world;🔽great love will appear in the world;

original: snying rje chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: snying rje chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: great compassion will appear in the world;

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha will appear in the world;

original: byang chub sems dpa'i @399a *//
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i @399a *//
translated: the bodhisattva

original: spyod pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: spyod pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: conduct will appear in the world;

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the result of stream enterer will appear in the world;

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the result of once-returner will appear in the world;

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //🔽dgra bcom pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro // dgra bcom pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the result of non-returner will appear in the world;🔽the state of a worthy one will appear in the world;

original: rang byang chub 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang byang chub 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: a pratyekabuddha’s awakening will appear in the world;

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening will appear in the world.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa /
translated: Then the Lord said to Śatakratu, head of the gods:

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: “Kauśika,

original: khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zungs shig /🔽chongs shig / lhogs shig /
analyzed: khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zungs shig / chongs shig / lhogs shig /

original: kun chub par gyis shig /
analyzed: kun chub par gyis shig /
translated: and master it.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig /
analyzed: khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig /
translated: you should attend to this perfection of wisdom properly in your mind.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,
