translated: All the gods, nāgas, yakṣas, gandharvas, asuras, garuḍas, kinnaras, and mahoragas that there are will also uphold this perfection of wisdom.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: 'di ltar / de dag thams cad ni /
analyzed: 'di ltar / de dag thams cad ni /
translated: It is because all of them

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go /
translated: have come forth from the perfection of wisdom.

original: de nas bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems par gyur to //
analyzed: de nas bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems par gyur to //
translated: Then the evil Māra thought this:

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'khor bzhi po 'di dag kyang mngon du gyur /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'khor bzhi po 'di dag kyang mngon du gyur /
translated: “The four retinues of the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One, are present,

original: 'dod pa la spyod pa dang / gzugs la spyod pa'i lha 'di dag kyang mngon du gyur ba las /
analyzed: 'dod pa la spyod pa dang / gzugs la spyod pa'i lha 'di dag kyang mngon du gyur ba las /
translated: and these gods who enjoy the pleasures of desire and the pleasures of form are present,

original: 'dir ni / gdon mi za bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyur gyis /
analyzed: 'dir ni / gdon mi za bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyur gyis /
translated: the bodhisattva mahāsattvas will certainly receive a prophecy of unsurpassed and perfect awakening.

original: de la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste bar chad bya'o //
analyzed: de la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste bar chad bya'o //
translated: Therefore, I will go to where the Blessed One is and create obstacles for them.”

original: snyam nas bdud sdig to can gyis dpung gi tshogs yan /
analyzed: snyam nas bdud sdig to can gyis dpung gi tshogs yan /
translated: Then Māra the evil one manifested an army with four divisions🔽and wanted to go to where the Blessed One was.

original: @411b lag bzhi pa mngon par sprul nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'gro 'dod par gyur pa dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems par gyur to //
analyzed: @411b lag bzhi pa mngon par sprul nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'gro 'dod par gyur pa dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems par gyur to //
translated: Then Śakra, Lord of the Gods, thought this:

original: kye ma bdud sdig to can 'di dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa mngon par sprul cing bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'gro bar 'dod la /
analyzed: kye ma bdud sdig to can 'di dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa mngon par sprul cing bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'gro bar 'dod la /
translated: “Alas, this Māra the evil one has manifested an army with four divisions and wants to go to where the Blessed One is.

original: bdud sdig to can gyi dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa rnam par bkod pa 'di ni /
analyzed: bdud sdig to can gyi dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa rnam par bkod pa 'di ni /
translated: This arrangement of the four divisions of Māra the evil one’s army

original: rgyal po bim bi sa ri'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa rnam par bkod pas kyang de tsam mi phod /
analyzed: rgyal po bim bi sa ri'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa rnam par bkod pas kyang de tsam mi phod /
translated: The four-division army of King Bimbisāra of Rājagṛha is not worth a sixteenth part of it.

original: rgyal po sde rab tu pham byed dang / sh'a kya rnams dang / li tsa byi rnams kyi dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa rnam par bkod pas kyang de tsam mi phod de /
analyzed: rgyal po sde rab tu pham byed dang / sh'a kya rnams dang / li tsa byi rnams kyi dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa rnam par bkod pas kyang de tsam mi phod de /
translated: The four-division army of King Prasenajit, the Śākyas, and the Licchavis is not worth a sixteenth part of it.

original: bdud sdig to can 'di ni /
analyzed: bdud sdig to can 'di ni /
translated: This evil Māra

original: yun ring po nas bcom ldan 'das la'ang glags lta zhing glags tshol ba /
analyzed: yun ring po nas bcom ldan 'das la'ang glags lta zhing glags tshol ba /
translated: has for a long time been looking for an opportunity and seeking an opportunity to harm the Blessed One,

original: sems can yang dag par brtson pa rnams la'ang gtso ba'i bsam pa can yin gyi /🔽bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang dag par bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: sems can yang dag par brtson pa rnams la'ang gtso ba'i bsam pa can yin gyi / bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang dag par bsam par bya'o //
translated: and he has a malicious attitude toward those beings who are striving correctly.🔽I will contemplate this perfection of wisdom.

original: dran pas brjod par bya'o /
analyzed: dran pas brjod par bya'o /
translated: I will recite it with mindfulness.

original: snyam nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang dag par bsam ste dran pas gsal bar brjod pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis ji lta ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gsal bar brjod pa de lta de ltar bdud sdig @412a can de dag lam de nyid dang /🔽sgo de nyid nas phyir log go /
analyzed: snyam nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang dag par bsam ste dran pas gsal bar brjod pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis ji lta ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gsal bar brjod pa de lta de ltar bdud sdig @412a can de dag lam de nyid dang / sgo de nyid nas phyir log go /
translated: Then Śakra, Lord of the Gods, having thought over this perfection of wisdom, having recollected it, having recited it, and as Śakra, Lord of the Gods, was reciting this perfection of wisdom, just that much did those wicked Māras turn back from where they had come.

original: de nas 'khor de na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang / 'og min gyi lha'i bar du ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag gis lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / na bza' mang po mngon par sprul nas bar snang gi nam mkha' la 'khod bzhin du bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der gtor te /
analyzed: de nas 'khor de na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang / 'og min gyi lha'i bar du ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag gis lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / na bza' mang po mngon par sprul nas bar snang gi nam mkha' la 'khod bzhin du bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der gtor te /
translated: Then the gods from the assembly, from the gods of the Catur­mahā­rāja­kāyika realm up to the Akaniṣṭha gods, having conjured up many divine flowers and garments, stood in the sky and scattered them over the Lord.

original: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der mngon par gtor nas tshig 'di skad du brjod do //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der mngon par gtor nas tshig 'di skad du brjod do //
translated: Having scattered them over the Lord, they said this:

original: dzambu'i gling gi mi 'di rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la yun ring por spyod par gyur cig /
analyzed: dzambu'i gling gi mi 'di rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la yun ring por spyod par gyur cig /
translated: May these people of Jambudvīpa practice this perfection of wisdom for a long time.

original: dzambu'i gling gi mi 'di dag ji srid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de srid du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang nub bar mi 'gyur la /
analyzed: dzambu'i gling gi mi 'di dag ji srid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de srid du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang nub bar mi 'gyur la /
translated: For as long as these people of Jambudvīpa practice the perfection of wisdom, for that long the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One will not disappear,

original: dam pa'i chos kyang yun ring du gnas shing /
analyzed: dam pa'i chos kyang yun ring du gnas shing /
translated: and the sublime Dharma will remain for a long time,

original: dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhe'o //
analyzed: dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhe'o //
translated: and the Jewel of the Saṅgha will appear in the world.”

original: dzambu'i gling gi mi rnams ji srid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa de srid du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang nub par mi 'gyur la /
analyzed: dzambu'i gling gi mi rnams ji srid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa de srid du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang nub par mi 'gyur la /
translated: As long as the people of Jambudvīpa practice this perfection of wisdom, for that long the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One will not disappear in the great billionfold world system, and so on up to: in all the world systems in the ten directions.

original: dam pa'i chos kyang @412b yun ring du gnas shing /
analyzed: dam pa'i chos kyang @412b yun ring du gnas shing /
translated: For that long the true Dharma will remain.

original: dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhe'o //
analyzed: dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhe'o //
translated: For that long the Jewel of the Saṅgha will appear in the world.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod pa khyad par du 'phags pa'ang yod par 'gyur zhe'o //🔽phyogs gang na rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod pa khyad par du 'phags pa'ang yod par 'gyur zhe'o // phyogs gang na rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: For that long the special practice of the bodhisattva mahāsattvas will exist.

original: rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du byas te 'chang ba'i phyogs de ni /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du byas te 'chang ba'i phyogs de ni /
translated: In whatever direction a son or daughter of good family writes out this perfection of wisdom, makes it into a book, and keeps it in mind, in that direction🔽the thought will occur to the gods:

original: snang ba dang ldan par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: snang ba dang ldan par rig par bya'o //
translated: One should know that it is endowed with light.

original: phyogs de ni /
analyzed: phyogs de ni /
translated: That direction

original: mgon dang bcas shing mun pa dang bral bar rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mgon dang bcas shing mun pa dang bral bar rig par bya'o //
translated: should be known as having a protector and as being free from darkness.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / 'og min gyi bar gyi lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / 'og min gyi bar gyi lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: Then the Lord said to Śatakratu, head of the gods, and to the gods in the assembly, up to those of the Akaniṣṭha class:

original: koo shi ka /🔽de de bzhin no //
analyzed: koo shi ka / de de bzhin no //
translated: “Kauśika,🔽it is just so,

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: just so!

original: lha'i bu dag /🔽de de bzhin no //
analyzed: lha'i bu dag / de de bzhin no //
translated: Gods,🔽it is just so,

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: just so!

original: ji srid du dzambu'i gling gi mi rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa de srid du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang nub par mi 'gyur la /
analyzed: ji srid du dzambu'i gling gi mi rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa de srid du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang nub par mi 'gyur la /
translated: As long as the humans in Jambudvīpa practice this perfection of wisdom, for that long the Tathāgata, Arhat, Perfectly Awakened One will not disappear,

original: dam pa'i chos kyang yun ring du gnas shing /
analyzed: dam pa'i chos kyang yun ring du gnas shing /
translated: and for that long the true Dharma will remain,

original: dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: and for that long the Jewel of the Saṅgha will appear in the world.”

original: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang nub @413a *//
analyzed: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang nub @413a *//
translated: The thus-gone, worthy, perfect buddhas in the worlds of the great trichiliocosm, and in all the worlds of the ten directions,🔽

original: par mi 'gyur la /
analyzed: par mi 'gyur la /
translated: The Tathāgatas, Arhats, and Perfectly Awakened Ones in the worlds of the great trichiliocosm, and in all the worlds in the ten directions, will not disappear.

original: dam pa'i chos kyang yun ring du gnas shing /
analyzed: dam pa'i chos kyang yun ring du gnas shing /
translated: The true Dharma will remain for a long time.

original: dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The Jewel of the Saṅgha will appear in the world.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod pa khyad par du 'phags pa'ang yod par 'gyur ro //🔽phyogs gang na /🔽rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du byas te 'chang ba'i phyogs de ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod pa khyad par du 'phags pa'ang yod par 'gyur ro // phyogs gang na / rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du byas te 'chang ba'i phyogs de ni /
translated: The special conduct of the bodhisattva mahāsattvas will exist.

original: snang ba dang ldan par ngas shes so //🔽phyogs de ni /
analyzed: snang ba dang ldan par ngas shes so // phyogs de ni /
translated: In whatever direction those sons of enlightened heritage or daughters of enlightened heritage write out and produce this perfection of wisdom in book form and then hold it, I know that that direction will be one of illumination.

original: mgon dang bcas shing mun pa dang bral bar ngas shes so //
analyzed: mgon dang bcas shing mun pa dang bral bar ngas shes so //
translated: I know that that direction will be one with a protector and free of darkness.

original: de nas lha'i bu de dag gis lha rdzas kyi me tog mang po mngon par sprul nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der mngon par gtor te /
analyzed: de nas lha'i bu de dag gis lha rdzas kyi me tog mang po mngon par sprul nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der mngon par gtor te /
translated: Then those sons of gods manifested many divine flowers and scattered them over the Lord.

original: 'di skad kyi tshig brjod do //🔽bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: 'di skad kyi tshig brjod do // bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: They spoke these words:

original: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid cing /🔽tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid ba de la bdud dam /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid cing / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid ba de la bdud dam /
translated: “Lord, those sons of a good family or daughters of a good family who take up this perfection of wisdom, bear it in mind, read it aloud, master it,

original: bdud kyi ris su /gtogs pa'i lha glags 'tshol ba rnams kyis glags mi rnyed do //
analyzed: bdud kyi ris su /gtogs pa'i lha glags 'tshol ba rnams kyis glags mi rnyed do //
translated: and properly pay attention to it will not be vulnerable to Māra or to the gods in the class of Māra who seek an opportunity.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Lord,

original: bdag cag gis kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de la rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / bskyang ba bgyi'o //
analyzed: bdag cag gis kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de la rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / bskyang ba bgyi'o //
translated: we will always and constantly guard, protect, and keep safe those sons of a good family or daughters of a good family.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: Because, Lord,

original: rigs kyi bu mo gang @413b shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de ni /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo gang @413b shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de ni /
translated: “Son of a good family or daughter of a good family who takes up, holds, reads aloud, masters, and properly pays attention to this perfection of wisdom

original: ston pa'am / ston pa dang mtshungs pa tsam du bdag cag sems so //
analyzed: ston pa'am / ston pa dang mtshungs pa tsam du bdag cag sems so //
translated: we think of them as a teacher or as just the same as a teacher.

original: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: ” Then Śatakratu, head of the gods, said to the Lord,

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Lord,

original: rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: son of a good family or

analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag ni /
translated: daughter of a good family who takes up, holds, reads aloud, masters, and properly pays attention to this perfection of wisdom

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba dma' ba dang ldan pa ma lags te /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba dma' ba dang ldan pa ma lags te /
translated: do not have a low root of merit.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Lord,

original: rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: son of a good family or

original: rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la bgyi ba bgyis par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la bgyi ba bgyis par 'gyur ro //
translated: Those sons of enlightened heritage or daughters of enlightened heritage who hold this transcendent perfection of wisdom, bear it in mind, read it aloud, master it, and are attentive to it in the correct manner have served the victors of the past.

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: those sons of enlightened heritage

original: rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni /
translated: or daughters of enlightened heritage who hold this transcendent perfection of wisdom, bear it in mind, read it aloud, master it, and are attentive to it in the correct manner

analyzed: sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur bgyis par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /

original: rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de @414a *//
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de @414a *//
translated: or daughters of enlightened heritage who hold this transcendent perfection of wisdom, bear it in mind, read it aloud, master it, and are attentive to it in the correct manner

analyzed: dag ni / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: they will be taken hold of by a spiritual friend.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na / 'di lta ste /

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid btsal bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid btsal bar bgyi'o //
translated: It is because the knowledge of all aspects is sought in this perfection of wisdom.

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / 'di lta ste /
translated: Blessed One,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa btsal bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa btsal bar bgyi'o //
translated: the perfection of wisdom is sought in the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽de ni / 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan la /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / de ni / 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan la /
translated: Blessed One,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags /🔽rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan la /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan la /
translated: it is because the perfection of wisdom is not one thing and the knowledge of all aspects another,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan ma lags te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan ma lags te /
translated: the knowledge of all aspects is not one thing and the perfection of wisdom another.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de la gnyis su ma mchis te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de la gnyis su ma mchis te /
translated: The perfection of wisdom and the knowledge of all aspects are not two and cannot be divided.

original: gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so //
analyzed: gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so //
translated: There is no duality.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said:

original: koo shi ka /🔽de de bzhin no //
analyzed: koo shi ka / de de bzhin no //
translated: Kauśika,

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: it is just so, it is just so!

original: koo shi ka /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni /
analyzed: koo shi ka / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni /
translated: Kauśika,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //🔽rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las byung ba ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las byung ba ni /
translated: the knowledge of all aspects of the tathāgatas, worthy ones, perfectly complete buddhas comes from the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom comes from the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: koo shi ka /🔽de ni / 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu @414b phyin pa'ang gzhan la /🔽rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin /🔽rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan la /
analyzed: koo shi ka / de ni / 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu @414b phyin pa'ang gzhan la / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan la /
translated: Kauśika,🔽it is because the perfection of wisdom is not one thing and the knowledge of all aspects another,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan ma yin te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan ma yin te /
translated: the knowledge of all aspects is not one thing and the perfection of wisdom another.

original: de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the perfection of wisdom and the knowledge of all aspects are not two, nor are they divided.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las /
translated: In the Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines,

original: le'u nyi shu pa'o ////
analyzed: le'u nyi shu pa'o ////
translated: this is chapter twenty.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the venerable Nanda said to the Blessed One,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yongs su brjod pa mdzad pa de ltar /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yongs su brjod pa mdzad pa de ltar /
translated: “Blessed One, just as you have explained the name of the perfection of wisdom,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /
translated: you have not explained the name of the perfection of generosity,

original: de ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /
analyzed: de ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /
translated: you have not explained the name of the perfection of ethical conduct,

original: de ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /
analyzed: de ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /
translated: you have not explained the name of the perfection of patience,

original: de ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /
analyzed: de ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /
translated: In the same way, he did not even mention the name of the perfection of effort.

original: de ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad do //
analyzed: de ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad do //
translated: In the same way, he did not even mention the name of the perfection of concentration.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yongs su brjod pa mdzad pa de ltar nang stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yongs su brjod pa mdzad pa de ltar nang stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /
translated: In the same way, the Lord did not even mention the name of inner emptiness,

original: de ltar phyi stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /
analyzed: de ltar phyi stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /
translated: did not even mention the name of outer emptiness,

original: de ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /
analyzed: de ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /
translated: did not even mention the name of inner and outer emptiness,

original: de ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa @415a *//
analyzed: de ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa @415a *//
translated: did not even mention the name of the emptiness of emptiness,

original: ma mdzad / de ltar chen po stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /
analyzed: ma mdzad / de ltar chen po stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /
translated: did not even mention the name of great emptiness,

original: de ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /🔽de ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /
analyzed: de ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad / de ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /
translated: In the same way, they do not fully explain the name ‘emptiness of the ultimate.’🔽In the same way, they do not fully explain the name ‘emptiness of the conditioned.’

original: de ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /🔽de ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /🔽de ltar thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /
analyzed: de ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad / de ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad / de ltar thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /
translated: In the same way, they do not fully explain the name ‘emptiness of the unconditioned.’🔽In the same way, they do not fully explain the name ‘emptiness of what is beyond limits.’🔽In the same way, they do not fully explain the name ‘emptiness of no beginning and no end.’

original: de ltar dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /
analyzed: de ltar dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /
translated: In the same way, they do not fully explain the name ‘emptiness of non-rejection.’

original: de ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /
analyzed: de ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /
translated: In the same way, they do not fully explain the name ‘emptiness of inherent existence.’

original: de ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /
analyzed: de ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /
translated: In the same way, they do not fully explain the name ‘emptiness of all phenomena.’

original: de ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /🔽de ltar mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /
analyzed: de ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad / de ltar mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /
translated: In the same way, he did not proclaim the name “emptiness of intrinsic nature.”🔽In the same way, he did not proclaim the name “emptiness of nonapprehension.”

original: de ltar dngos po med pa'i stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /
analyzed: de ltar dngos po med pa'i stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /
translated: In the same way, he did not proclaim the name “emptiness of nonthings.”

original: de ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /
analyzed: de ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /
translated: In the same way, he did not proclaim the name “emptiness of essential nature.”

original: de ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad do //
analyzed: de ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad do //
translated: In the same way, he did not proclaim the name “emptiness of the essential nature of nonthings.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yongs su brjod pa mdzad pa de ltar dran @415b pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yongs su brjod pa mdzad pa de ltar dran @415b pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /
translated: Just as the Lord proclaimed the name of the perfection of wisdom, in the same way he did not proclaim the names of the applications of mindfulness,

original: de ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /
analyzed: de ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /
translated: and in the same way he did not proclaim the names of the right efforts,

original: de ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /🔽de ltar dbang po rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /
analyzed: de ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad / de ltar dbang po rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /
translated: He did not even mention the names of the bases of supernatural power.🔽He did not even mention the names of the powers.

original: de ltar stobs rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad de ltar byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /
analyzed: de ltar stobs rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad de ltar byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /
translated: He did not even mention the names of the limbs of awakening.

original: de ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad do //
analyzed: de ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad do //
translated: He did not even mention the name of the noble eightfold path.

original: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yongs su brjod pa mdzad pa de ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /
analyzed: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yongs su brjod pa mdzad pa de ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /
translated: Just as he did not even mention the name of the perfection of wisdom, so too he did not even mention the names of the noble truths.

original: de ltar bsam gtan rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /
analyzed: de ltar bsam gtan rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /
translated: He did not even mention the names of the concentrations.

original: de ltar tshad med pa rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /
analyzed: de ltar tshad med pa rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /
translated: He did not even mention the names of the immeasurables.

original: de ltar gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad do //
analyzed: de ltar gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad do //
translated: Thus, he did not even mention the names of the formless absorptions.

original: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yongs su brjod pa mdzad pa de ltar rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /
analyzed: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yongs su brjod pa mdzad pa de ltar rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /
translated: Just as he did not mention the name of the perfection of wisdom, so he did not mention the names of the eight deliverances.

original: de ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /🔽de ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa @416a *//
analyzed: de ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad / de ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa @416a *//
translated: Just as he did not mention the names of the eight deliverances, so he did not mention the names of the nine serial absorptions.

original: med pa'i ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /
analyzed: med pa'i ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /
translated: Just as he did not mention the names of the nine serial absorptions, so he did not mention the names of the emptiness gate of liberation, the signlessness gate of liberation, and the wishlessness gate of liberation.

original: de ltar mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /🔽de ltar ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /
analyzed: de ltar mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad / de ltar ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /
translated: Just as he did not mention the names of the three gates of liberation, so he did not mention the names of the clairvoyances.🔽Just as he did not mention the names of the clairvoyances, so he did not mention the names of the meditative stabilizations.

original: de ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad do //
analyzed: de ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad do //
translated: Just as he did not mention the names of the meditative stabilizations, so he did not mention the names of the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yongs su brjod pa mdzad pa de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /
analyzed: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yongs su brjod pa mdzad pa de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /
translated: Just as he has not proclaimed the name of the perfection of wisdom, so he has not proclaimed the name of the ten powers of a tathāgata.

original: de ltar mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /
analyzed: de ltar mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /
translated: He has not proclaimed the name of the four fearlessnesses.

original: de ltar so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /
analyzed: de ltar so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /
translated: He has not proclaimed the name of the four detailed and thorough knowledges.

original: de ltar snying rje chen po'i ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /
analyzed: de ltar snying rje chen po'i ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad /
translated: He has not proclaimed the name of great compassion.

original: de ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad do //
analyzed: de ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad do //
translated: He has not proclaimed the name of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: dga' bo / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: dga' bo / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'di lta ste /
translated: “Ānanda, the perfection of wisdom is as follows:

original: pha rol tu phyin pa lnga dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa lnga dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /
translated: the five perfections, all the emptinesses, the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening, the four noble truths, the four concentrations, the four immeasurables, the four formless absorptions,

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / @416b mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / @416b mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /
translated: the eight liberations, the nine serial absorptions, the emptiness gate of liberation, the signlessness gate of liberation, the wishlessness gate of liberation, the clairvoyances, the meditative stabilizations,

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag gi thog mar 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag gi thog mar 'gro ba'o //
translated: the dhāraṇī gateways, the ten tathāgata powers, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: kun tu 'dren pa'o //
analyzed: kun tu 'dren pa'o //
translated: They are the leaders.🔽Ānanda,

original: kun dga' bo /
analyzed: kun dga' bo /
translated: Ānanda,

original: de ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: de ji snyam du sems /

analyzed: kun dga' bo / gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa @417b thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i sbyin pa ni /

analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no //
translated: The perfection of moral discipline is the moral discipline that is dedicated to omniscience by way of nonarising and nonapprehending.

translated: great compassion in the manner of non-duality, the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha in the manner of non-duality, the result of stream enterer in the manner of non-duality, the result of once-returner in the manner of non-duality,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / dgra bcom pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / rang byang chub gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i @421a *//

translated: the way the two aspects of the result of non-returning are non-dual, the way the two aspects of the state of a worthy one are non-dual, the way the two aspects of a pratyekabuddha’s awakening are non-dual, and the way the two aspects of unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening are non-dual.🔽

original: byang chub gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis so //
analyzed: byang chub gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis so //
translated: the way the two fruits of non-returner are non-dual, the way arhatship is non-dual, the way individual enlightenment is non-dual, and the way unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening is non-dual.”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Subhūti said, “Lord,

original: ji ltar gzugs gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar 'du shes gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar 'du byed gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rnam par shes pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /

original: ji ltar mig gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rna ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar sna gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lce gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lus gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: ji ltar mig gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rna ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar sna gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lce gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lus gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /
translated: the way the two eyes are nondual, the way the two ears are nondual, the way the two noses are nondual, the way the two tongues are nondual, the way the two bodies are nondual,

original: ji ltar yid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar gzugs gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar sgra gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar dri gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar ro gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: ji ltar yid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar gzugs gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar sgra gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar dri gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar ro gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /

translated: the way in which the two aspects of contact are non-dual, the way in which the two aspects of phenomena are non-dual, the way in which the two aspects of eye consciousness are non-dual, the way in which the two aspects of ear consciousness are non-dual,

translated: the way in which the two aspects of nose consciousness are non-dual, the way in which the two aspects of tongue consciousness are non-dual, the way in which the two aspects of body consciousness are non-dual, and the way in which the two aspects of mind consciousness are non-dual.

original: ji ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar sna'i 'dus te reg pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lce'i 'dus te reg pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /

translated: how the union of the tongue is non-dual,🔽how the union of the body is non-dual,🔽how the union of the mind is non-dual,

original: ji ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /

translated: how the feeling that arises from the conditions of the union of the eye is non-dual,

original: ji ltar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /🔽ji ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar sa'i khams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: ji ltar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar sa'i khams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /
translated: how feeling conditioned by sensory contact that is visually compounded is non-dual; how feeling conditioned by sensory contact that is audibly compounded is non-dual; how feeling conditioned by sensory contact that is tangibly compounded is non-dual;🔽how feeling conditioned by sensory contact that is mentally compounded is non-dual; how the earth element is non-dual;

original: ji ltar chu'i khams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar me'i khams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rlung gi khams gnyis su ma @422a *//

translated: how the water element is non-dual; how the fire element is non-dual; how the wind element is non-dual;

original: mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar nam mkha'i khams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rnam par shes pa'i khams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar ma rig pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar 'du byed gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar nam mkha'i khams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rnam par shes pa'i khams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar ma rig pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar 'du byed gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /

original: ji ltar rnam par shes pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar ming dang gzugs gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar skye mched drug gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar reg pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /

translated: the way consciousness is nondual, the way name and form are nondual, the way the six sense sources are nondual, the way contact is nondual,

analyzed: ji ltar tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar sred pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar len pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar srid pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar skye ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /
translated: the way birth is non-dual,🔽the way aging and death are non-dual,🔽the way the perfection of generosity is non-dual,🔽the way the perfection of ethical discipline is non-dual,

translated: the way the perfection of patience is non-dual,

translated: how the perfection of diligence is non-dual,🔽how the perfection of concentration is non-dual, how the perfection of wisdom is non-dual,

translated: how inner emptiness is non-dual, how outer emptiness is non-dual, how inner and outer emptiness is non-dual, how the emptiness of emptiness is non-dual,

original: ji ltar chen po stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: ji ltar chen po stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /
translated: the manner in which the emptiness of the great is non-dual, the manner in which the emptiness of the ultimate is non-dual, the manner in which the emptiness of the conditioned is non-dual, the manner in which the emptiness of the unconditioned is non-dual,

original: ji ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar dor ba med pa stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: ji ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar dor ba med pa stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /
translated: the manner in which the emptiness of what is beyond extremes is non-dual, the manner in which the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless is non-dual, the manner in which the emptiness of what is not to be discarded is non-dual,

original: ji ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /

translated: the way the emptiness of inherent existence is non-dual, the way the emptiness of all phenomena is non-dual, the way the emptiness of its own mark is non-dual, the way the emptiness of non-apprehension is non-dual,

original: ji ltar dngos po med pa stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong @423a *//

translated: the way the emptiness of non-things is non-dual, the way the emptiness of essence is non-dual, and the way the emptiness of the essential nature of non-things is non-dual,

translated: the way the applications of mindfulness are non-dual, the way the correct exertions are non-dual, the way the supports for miraculous abilities are non-dual,

translated: the way the faculties are non-dual, the way the powers are non-dual, the way the branches of awakening are non-dual, and the way the noble eightfold path is non-dual,

translated: the way the noble truths are non-dual, the way the higher knowledges are non-dual, the way the immeasurables are non-dual, the way the formless absorptions are non-dual,🔽the way the eight deliverances are non-dual, the way the nine serial absorptions are non-dual, the way the emptiness, signlessness, and

original: ji ltar rnam par thar pa brgyad gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /

translated: wishlessness doors of liberation are non-dual, the way conditioned and unconditioned phenomena are non-dual, and the way all dharmas are non-dual.

translated: the way the two aspects of the absence of wishes are not two, the way the two aspects of the superknowledges are not two, the way the two aspects of the meditative stabilities are not two, the way the two aspects of the dhāraṇī gateways are not two,

original: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar mi 'jigs pa bzhi gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar snying rje chen po gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar mi 'jigs pa bzhi gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar snying rje chen po gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /
translated: the way the two aspects of the ten tathāgata powers are not two, the way the two aspects of the four fearlessnesses are not two, the way the two aspects of the four detailed and thorough knowledges are not two, the way the two aspects of great compassion are not two,

original: ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /
translated: How is it that the result of once-returner is non-dual?🔽How is it that the result of non-returner is non-dual?🔽How is it that the state of a worthy one is non-dual?🔽How is it that a pratyekabuddha’s awakening is non-dual?

original: ji ltar phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar dgra bcom pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rang byang chub gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: ji ltar phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar dgra bcom pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rang byang chub gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /
translated: How is it that the knowledge of path aspects is non-dual?🔽How is it that the knowledge of all aspects is non-dual?

original: ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis lags ////
analyzed: ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis lags ////
translated: How is it that unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening is non-dual?”🔽“Kauśika, it is because form is empty of form.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

original: snying rje chen pos stong ste /

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

original: phyir zhe na /
analyzed: phyir zhe na /

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do // phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni /

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong ste /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong ste /
translated: The result of non-returner is empty of the result of non-returner.🔽Why is that?🔽Because the result of non-returner and the perfections are not two and are not divided.🔽The state of a worthy one is empty of the state of a worthy one.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: dgra bcom pa nyid kyis stong ste /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid kyis stong ste /

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

original: rang byang chub kyis stong ste /
analyzed: rang byang chub kyis stong ste /

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
